```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(crosstalk)
pokemon <- read_csv("pokemon.csv")
shared_pokemon <- SharedData$new(pokemon)
```

SidebarName {.sidebar}
----------------------
```{r}
filter_select("poke_type", "Pokemon Type", shared_pokemon, ~`Type 1`)
```

Column
-------------------------------------

### Component 1

```{r}
p1 <- shared_pokemon %>%
  ggplot() +
  geom_boxplot(
    aes(x = reorder(`Type 1`, Total, FUN=median), y = Total, fill = `Type 1`)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45)) +
 labs(
    x = "Pokemon Defenses",
    y = "Pokemon Attacks"
    )
ggplotly(p1)
```

Column
-------------------------------------

### Component 2

```{r}
p2 <- shared_pokemon %>%
  ggplot() + 
  geom_point(mapping = aes(x = Defense, y = Attack, color = `Type 1`)) +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45)) +
  labs(
    x = "Pokemon Defenses",
    y = "Pokemin Attacks",
    title = "Scatter Plot Showing the Attacks and Defneses of Pokemons"
    )
ggplotly(p2)
```
